MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH40 postcode area of East Linton. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:45pm due to faulty overhead line equipment located at Tyningham Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:04pm on Sunday, 15 November 2020
